Subject: Avoiding Capture
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He avoided the net this time. He just stoped. Fury's shot had skinned
his arm.
"ArcAngel, if you and your friend would calm down, I'll explain.
I have no intintion of hurting Magnus. I just came to visit."
He keeps a close eye on the Maximals, and Magnus.
"Dont try to touch her! I love Feline. You attempt to harm her, I rip
out cerebral processor!"

OOC:I have an idea! Have ArcAngel use the Matrix on Hot Rod. He will
turn good but go under cover in the Alliance. He just keep acting evil.
And he'll still love Feline.
